subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following is NOT a state in Rajputana?
explanation_en: Chandigarh is the capital of Haryana and not a state in Rajputana.
explanation_hi: चंद्रगढ़, Haryana के निवास नहीं, राजपुत्राणा में।
